Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to discharge of a mortgage
Summary: Requires a mortgagee to accept and apply payments.
LawCode: Amd ยง275, RP L; amd ยง1921, RPAP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law and the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to discharge of a mortgage
